description:
Tested on Revision no 624

If I try to run instance then I always get an error message in the nova-scheduler.log saying 
"NotFound: No service for , nova-compute"


/etc/nova/nova.conf
------------------------
--daemonize=1
--dhcpbridge_flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
--dhcpbridge=/home/openstack/nova/bin/nova-dhcpbridge
--logdir=/var/log/nova
--state_path=/var/lib/nova
--networks_path=/var/lib/nova/networks
--sql_connection=mysql://root:nova@10.2.3.150/nova
--scheduler_driver=nova.scheduler.simple.SimpleScheduler
--s3_host=10.2.3.150
--cc_host=10.2.3.150
--rabbit_host=10.2.3.150
--ec2_url=http://10.2.3.150:8773/services/Cloud
--network_manager=nova.network.manager.VlanManager
--fixed_range=172.16.0.0/24
--network_size=32
--routing_source_ip=10.2.3.150
--verbose
--libvirt_type=kvm
--vlan_interface=eth0
--public_interface=eth1
--default_log_levels=amqplib=INFO, sqlalchemy=INFO, eventlet.wsgi.server=DEBUG
--use_ipv6=False
--ec2_prefix=http
--ec2_host=10.2.3.150
--ec2_port=8773
--ec2_suffix=services/Cloud

nova-scheduler.log
--------------------------
2011-01-27 11:28:26,693 ERROR nova.root [-] Exception during message handling
(nova.root): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/rpc.py", line 192, in receive
(nova.root): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/scheduler/manager.py", line 61, in _schedule
(nova.root): TRACE:     **kwargs)
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/scheduler/simple.py", line 49, in schedule_run_instance
(nova.root): TRACE:     'nova-compute')
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/db/api.py", line 131, in service_get_by_args
(nova.root): TRACE:     return IMPL.service_get_by_args(context, host, binary)
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 96, in wrapper
(nova.root): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kwargs)
(nova.root): TRACE:   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/nova-2011.1-py2.6.egg/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 251, in service_get_by_args
(nova.root): TRACE:     % locals())
(nova.root): TRACE: NotFound: No service for , nova-compute
(nova.root): TRACE:
title: NotFound exception: No service for host using simple.SimpleScheduler

Tested on Revision no 624

If I try to run instance then I always get an error message in the nova-scheduler.log saying 
"NotFound: No service for , nova-compute"

------------------------
--daemonize=1
--dhcpbridge_flagfile=/etc/nova/nova.conf
